import React from 'react' import './booking.css' import {Form, FormFGroup, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Button} from 'reactstrap'; const Booking = ({tour,avgRating}) => { const {price, review} = tour return

Rs.{price}/per person

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} ({review?.length})
{/* =======================booking form start============================= */}
Information
{/* =======================booking form end============================= */}
} export default Booking
